sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This is one time script which change sys_dictionary for selected table which has reference to sys_flow_context, set reference_cascade rule to none intead of --None-- (same as null). Why we changing it ? : If we set cascade rule to none, it will not clear the value when record get deleted from sys_flow_context Owner : Dev-Flow Engine</description> <name>Flow designer : DEF0237132 </name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[ var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary"); gr.addEncodedQuery("reference=sys_flow_context^elementLIKEcontext^nameINsc_cat_item_review_flow_context_mtom,sc_req_item,sc_service_fulfillment_step_data,sys_flow_plan_context_binding,var__m_sys_flow_step_definition_output_779583e053020300f5bf435723dc342b,var__m_sys_hub_flow_logic_variable_5ede711653223300414eddeeff7b1256"); gr.reference_cascade_rule = 'none'; gr.setWorkflow(false); gr.updateMultiple();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>sunil.kumar@snc</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-09-22 19:13:56</sys_created_on> <sys_id>9be1448977323010b599e0490e5a9921</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Flow designer : DEF0237132 </sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Flow Designer Action Trigger" source="com.glide.hub.flow_trigger">3be9f8683cf1311068bcf327dfe37fe0</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_9be1448977323010b599e0490e5a9921</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>sunil.kumar@snc</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-09-22 19:13:56</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
